long_description: Featuring a long-lasting LED bulb, the Maglite 2D LED flashlight has the same look and feel as the original Maglite but with a brighter, more efficient beam to light up the night. High-quality LED outputs 134 lumens and throws a beam up to 388m to light up your nighttime adventures. Just like with the original Maglite, a simple press of a button turns the light on and off; twisting the head focuses the beam from spot to flood. Rugged anodized aluminum construction resists water and corrosion. O-ring seals keep moisture out. Maglite 2D LED Flashlight includes 2 D-cell batteries for up to 8 hrs. of use.
short_description: Featuring a long-lasting LED bulb, the Maglite 2D LED flashlight has the same look and feel as the original Maglite but with a brighter, more efficient beam to light up the night.
